attributes.action: Make it a condition of employment that politicians & public servants should not be able to have criminal records or defraud the puiblic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Politicians & civil servants giving the excuse that they do not wish to disclose information on their expenses as they may be forced to resign is ridiculous, giving that answer should immediately initiate a police investigation. Make it a condition of holding office / continued employment that they should not have a criminal record & as far as expenses are concerned they should be as accountable as anyone in a private company, submit your expenses for approval at the end of each month, if you do not have receipts or they can not be fully justified it comes out of your own pocket.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
